testcase.classname: Fix for INC03252680 - When requesting Off Catalog Item service, there should be an option to Ship To a user's address instead of just Shipping to a Stockroom
testcase.name: Verify the user is able to submit the request with item "Off Catalog Item (Canada, US)"
testcase.system-out: Given User logged into Service Now Portal...................................skipped When Clicks on Request service link on the home page........................skipped Then user select the requested for as with index "poddepa"..................skipped And User gets select the country as "Canada"................................skipped When user search the item "Off Catalog Item (Canada, US)"...................skipped And Click on the Item link..................................................skipped Then Verify the title "Off Catalog Item (Canada, US)".......................skipped And Fill all the mandatory fields...........................................skipped And click on add cart button and submit the request for HP Item "STRY0020960_TC01".skipped And store the tciket number in sheet for row as "<row_Index>"...............skipped And User launch the IETL view and search the request........................skipped
